analyzed: kathāvatthu
mahāpaṇṇāsaka
soḷasama vagga
rūpa rūpāvacara a rūpāvacaranti kathā

āmantā

original: Samāpattesiyaṁ upapattesiyaṁ diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṁ, samāpattesiyena cittena upapattesiyena
analyzed: samāpattesiyam upapattesiyam diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihāra samāpattesiyena cittena upapattesiyena

original: cittena diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārena cittena sahagataṁ sahajātaṁ saṁsaṭṭhaṁ sampayuttaṁ
analyzed: cittena diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihārena cittena sahagatam sahajātam sa saṭṭham sampayutta
eka uppādam eka nirodham eka vatthukam eka ārammaṇam ti
na ha ivam vattabbe pe

original: nanu na samāpattesiyaṁ na upapattesiyaṁ na diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṁ, na samāpattesiyena
analyzed: nanu na samāpattesiyam na upapattesiyam na diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihāra na samāpattesiyena

original: cittena na upapattesiyena cittena na diṭṭhadhammasukhavihārena cittena sahagataṁ
analyzed: cittena na upapattesiyena cittena na diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihārena cittena sahagata

original: sahajātaṁ saṁsaṭṭhaṁ sampayuttaṁ ekuppādaṁ ekanirodhaṁ ekavatthukaṁ ekārammaṇanti?
analyzed: sahajātam sa saṭṭham sampayuttam eka uppādam eka nirodham eka vatthukam eka ārammaṇam ti
āmantā

original: Hañci na samāpattesiyaṁ na upapattesiyaṁ na diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṁ, na samāpattesiyena cittena …pe…
analyzed: hañci na samāpattesiyam na upapattesiyam na diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihāra na samāpattesiyena cittena pe

original: ekārammaṇaṁ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: eka ārammaṇa no ca vata re vattabbe
atthi rūpam rūpā avacaranti
atthi rūpam arūpā avacaranti
āmantā

analyzed: cittena diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihārena cittena sahagatam sahajātam sa saṭṭham sampayutta
eka uppādam eka nirodham eka vatthukam eka ārammaṇam ti
na ha ivam vattabbe pe

original: nanu na samāpattesiyaṁ na upapattesiyaṁ na diṭṭhadhammasukhavihāraṁ, na samāpattesiyena cittena …pe…
analyzed: nanu na samāpattesiyam na upapattesiyam na diṭṭhadhamma sukha vihāra na samāpattesiyena cittena pe

hañci na samāpatti isiyam na upapatti isiyam pe

āmantā

original: Hañci kāmāvacarakammassa katattā rūpaṁ kāmāvacaraṁ, tena vata re vattabbe—
analyzed: hañci kāmāvacara kammassa kata ttā rūpam kāmāvacara tena vata re vattabbe

original: “rūpāvacarakammassa katattā rūpaṁ rūpāvacaraṁ, arūpāvacarakammassa katattā rūpaṁ arūpāvacaran”ti.
